title: Creamy Hot Chocolate Recipe
description: This hot chocolate with sweetened condensed milk, cocoa, and vanilla is a comforting beverage to have on hand to warm up with on cold winter days.

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Trusted Brands: Recipes and Tips EAGLE BRAND® Creamy Hot Chocolate 4.5 (311) 234 Reviews 29 Photos This hot chocolate with sweetened condensed milk is easy to make. Keep some condensed milk on hand for cold days, and whip up a batch of this rich hot chocolate to warm your loved ones. Submitted by Eagle brand Updated on May 30, 2023 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 29 29 29 29 Prep Time: 10 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 8 Yield: 2 quarts Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 1 (14 ounce) can Eagle Brand sweetened condensed milk ½ cup unsweetened cocoa 1 ½ teaspoons vanilla extract ⅛ teaspoon salt 6 ½ cups hot water 3 mini marshmallows Directions Combine sweetened condensed milk, cocoa, vanilla, and salt in a large saucepan over medium heat; mix well. Slowly stir in hot water; cook until heated through, stirring occasionally. Do not boil. Top with marshmallows. Store covered in the refrigerator. Recipe Tips You can store hot chocolate in the refrigerator for up to 5 days. Mix well and reheat before serving.To make hot chocolate in the microwave, combine all ingredients except marshmallows in a 2-quart glass measure. Microwave on high (100% power) for 8 to 10 minutes, stirring every 3 minutes. Top with marshmallows and store covered in the refrigerator. I Made It Print 432 home cooks made it! I used 2% milk instead of water.
